CustomField.description: MILESTONES_APEX will inserts Milestones with Monthly Allowance as Invoice Line Item Quantity, for Ongoing projects with ProjectType__c = 'Managed Service", ProjectEndDateTrig__c in the future and no open Invoice connected for the period.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Please enter the monthly allowance that the customer can use for Managed Service. Will be the quantity of each Invoice that will be created.
CustomField.label: Monthly Allowance
